#paragraph: Social and cultural practices regarding access to, and use of, marine resources often reflect - and enforce - disparities between men and women. Examining gender roles in ocean-related activities, in different places and contexts, is often insightful. Among the others, because of the "fisherman" dominant image, the vital role of women in the fishing sector has long been overlooked (and their labour rights denied).

#paragraph: Any Ocean issue calls for different actors bearing different values and needs.
